Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, pass-through, Elevator, Generator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 The three-room luxurious apartment for rent with the wonderful views from the two balconies; located in the prestigious Vake district of the city the apartment includes: Mitsubishi elevators, underground garage for 4 cars, central heating, hot water, fast internet, 2 air-conditioners, furniture, built-in wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, all kinds of the domestic electrical equipment available.

details.address: Tbilisi, Vake-Saburtalo,  Vake, I. Chavchavadze Ave.
